level.heading: Marketing recyclable materials.
level.text: ยง 16-313 Marketing recyclable materials. The department shall establish procedures, standards and strategies to market the recyclable materials designated pursuant to section 16-305 of this chapter, including, but not limited to, maintaining a list of prospective buyers, establishing contact with prospective buyers, entering into contracts with buyers, and reviewing and making any necessary changes in collecting or processing the materials to improve their marketability.
